answers.answer: I was told to fast from 12am until the test is over so that you can have accurent results.
You should eat an hour before. Something with protein like an egg sandwich. You only fast for the 3 hr one. I got so sick from the 1 hr one bcuz i didnt know i could eat, i barely passed.

question: Tomorrow I have the GTT.. (gestational diabetes test) at 10am and I wanted to know if it's okayy to have regular breakfast before going there????  Or should I call tomorrow in the morning to my doctor to make sure? . Help??
title: help !!
